Articles.Content:
I had just finished building a space station last night, and had switched to another craft in orbit, and when I did, the controls for the comms satellite didn't respond. I thought nothing of it, then went to bed shortly after.

Now after getting on KSP today, I've found that all of my vessels have their controls locked out, and I'm unable to control throttle, xyz controls, the camera, or even pause the game. As of now all my vessels are currently inoperative, and I'm unable to control them.

(Note: Resetting the game and Xbox seems to help fix the bug, but it's still annoying and in need of squashing nonetheless.)
